TextView.android:text:
Steps:
 1. Select the type of computation you want from the navigation drawer. 
 2. Insert the required values. 
 3. Then press the 'Compute' button. The result will be displayed at the result field, below the 'Compute' button. 
 
 
Note: 
 1. All non relevant cells should be filled with a zero (0) value, otherwise an error message will pop up. 
 2. The values of α, λ and Nq* (Meyerhof's Method) can be given or can be filled zero (0) value so that the App will determine it by itself.
